title: Web Development Practice Competency Enhancement: Effective Team-Based Learning Strategy Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Three or more strategies can be proposed for designing effective activities at each stage of team-based learning (preparation, readiness assurance, application).
Peer assessment and feedback processes can be operated using team collaboration tools based on a Learning Management System (LMS).
Two or more learning process design elements for improving learning satisfaction can be applied to actual case studies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
